phrs.translation: 教育的, 有教育意义的

sentences.sentence: Tourism has a profound impact both on the world economy and, because of the educative effect of travel and the effects on employment, on society itself.
sentences.translation: 旅游业不仅对世界经济产生了深远的影响，而且由于旅游的教育作用和对就业的影响，也对社会本身产生了深远的影响。

sentences.sentence: For an absurd man it is more educative than all libraries.
sentences.translation: 对于一个荒谬的人来说，这种哲学比所有的图书馆更有所受益。

sentences.sentence: These educative programs will be only the beginning of events that lead up to first contact!
sentences.translation: 这些教育计划将只是事件的开端，并导致第一次接触的发生！
